apiProducts.label: Account Information
apiProducts.description: Access the user’s list of accounts and transactions.

apiProducts.label: Payment Initiation
apiProducts.description: Initiate payments (transfers) with strong customer authentication and confirm charges.

apiProducts.label: Confirmation of Funds
apiProducts.description: Initiate payments (transfers) with strong customer authentication and confirm charges.

apiProducts.label: Points of Interest
apiProducts.description: Use the Point of Interest API Product to obtain geographic information about your branches and other POIs. Let your customers view their nearest branches, see the queues and waiting time estimations and generate an e-queuing ticket that lets them know when their turn is expected for service at the branch of their convenience. Were your customers happy with the service? Let them rate their visit!

apiProducts.label: Accounts
apiProducts.description: With Accounts you can retrieve information about existing accounts or create new accounts at any bank.

apiProducts.label: Transations
apiProducts.description: With Transactions you can retrieve transaction information of accounts at any bank.

apiProducts.label: Payments
apiProducts.description: With Payments you can send money to any card or bank account (domestic or cross border).

apiProducts.label: IBAN Validation
apiProducts.description: With IBAN validation you can get the IBAN of an NBG account or check that an IBAN is valid and corresponds to an NBG account.

apiProducts.label: FX Rates
apiProducts.description: With FX Rates you can get information about foreign exchange market rates.

apiProducts.label: Biometrics
apiProducts.description: With Biometrics you can count and compare faces in images and detect user liveness in videos.

apiProducts.label: Crowdfunding
apiProducts.description: Crowdfunding is the practice of funding a project or venture by raising many small amounts of money from a large number of people. This API helps you to integrate your app with NBG Crowdfunding Infrastructure.

apiProducts.label: Cards
apiProducts.description: With the Cards product you can get information about the user’s cards at any bank.

apiProducts.label: i-bank Pay eCommerce Platform
apiProducts.description: The i-bank Pay eCommerce Platform lets you easily integrate the i-bank Pay payment method into your website in a two-part process, addressing both the client side to create payment tokens and the API calls to finalize the payments.

apiProducts.label: Bill Payments
apiProducts.description: Take full control of your bill payment lifecycle. Our real-time processing helps you maintain control of your user interface while minimizing the costs.

apiProducts.label: Loan Payments Platform
apiProducts.description: By using the Loan Payment Platform, you can get information and pay instalments of your customer’s loan, issued by NBG.

apiProducts.label: Rewards Platform
apiProducts.description: Increase your customer’s loyalty by applying your own rewarding platform. Customize your loyalty campaigns and monitor the loyalty experience, resulting in increased engagement with your customers.

apiProducts.label: Digital Payments Wallet
apiProducts.description: Real-time payments to any individual or company at the tip of your finger.

apiProducts.label: Social Network Platform
apiProducts.description: By uploading your contacts, you have the ability to interact with them by creating posts, by sending direct messages or by reacting on the posts and on the direct messages of your contacts. Empower your clients with a fully functional Social Network Platform.

apiProducts.label: Optical Character Recognition
apiProducts.description: The OCR (Optical Character Recognition) API gives you the ability to convert different types of documents into editable and searchable data.

apiProducts.label: ERP Bank Connection
apiProducts.description: Empower your clients with full control of their NBG finance in one place and increase your customer satisfaction. Connect to a user’s bank account or card and perform money transfers.
